img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a bald character wearing a robe is kneeling on the ground in a dimly lit, stone-walled environment. In front of this character is a ghostly, transparent figure labeled "Non-Void," which appears to be lying down or crouching. The game interface shows various icons and gauges, including a health bar and other status indicators, suggesting gameplay elements such as abilities or inventory items.
